__e: I can't believe it the view, and the fact that you've brought me here.
Toni, I haven't wanted to go into this but what if I told you that it's my wife who wants the divorce?
I want something I can be proud of too. And if they print my story...
I was sore as hell at Toni, and then suddenly it was like magic.
I will talk to Tony, and I will see if he can work his magic.
For your information, sir, Toni and I are getting married.
